                                       java.sql.Date dateCreated,

                                       java.lang.String shoeSize,

                                       java.lang.String updatedBy,
                                       java.sql.Timestamp timestamp,
                                       java.lang.Object referenceCharacters)
        This method saves the patient's progress note to the database.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient ID
        dateCreated - the date the note was created
        medicalInsurance - medical insurance status
        shoeSize - shoe size
        allergicToMedications - allergic to medications status
        allergies - allergies
        weight - the patient's weight
        heightFeet - the feet of the patient's height
        heightInches - the inches of the patient's height
        weightReductionGoal - the goal for weight reduction
        pulse - the pulse
        respirations - the respirations count
        temperature - the temperature
        footScreening - the foot screening status
        medications - the medications
        a1c - the A1C measurement
        glucose - the glucose measurement
        dec - the data entry container
        nurseOrDietitianNote - the note from the nurse or dietitian
        subjective - the subjective note
        objective - the objective note
        assessment - the assessment note
        plan - the plan note
        updatedBy - the registry user
        timestamp - the timestamp of the note update
        referenceCharacters - the character string
        Returns:
        the status of the save operation
